name: @ekscss/framework
description: Progressive CSS framework powered by ekscss
author: Max Milton <max@happycode.ltd>

scripts.build: pnpm run prebuild && pnpm run build-levels && pnpm run build-addons && pnpm run postbuild
scripts.build-addons: /bin/sh -ec 'for f in $(basename -s .xcss addon/*.xcss); do xcss -qm addon/$f.xcss dist/addon/$f.css; done'
scripts.build-levels: /bin/sh -ec 'for f in level1 level2 level3; do xcss -qm $f.xcss dist/$f.css; done'
